trans-unit.source: Represents a single relationship between an object and a member.
trans-unit.target: Representa una relación única entre un objeto y un miembro.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService> is used by a serializer to announce that one property is related to a property on another object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService> se usa un serializador para anunciar que está relacionado con una propiedad a una propiedad en otro objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship> represents a single relationship between an object and a member that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService> uses in its interactions with a serializer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship> Representa una relación única entre un objeto y un miembro que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationshipService> utiliza en sus interacciones con un serializador.

trans-unit.source: The object that owns <c>member</c>.
trans-unit.target: Objeto propietario de <c>member</c>.

trans-unit.source: The member which is to be related to <c>owner</c>.
trans-unit.target: Miembro que se va a relacionar con <c>owner</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="owner" /> or <paramref name="member" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="owner" /> o <paramref name="member" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the empty member relationship.
trans-unit.target: Representa la relación de miembro vacía.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo es de solo lectura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship> structure is empty if neither the owner nor the member is assigned.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship> estructura está vacía si no se asigna el propietario ni el miembro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> que se va a comparar con el objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina si dos instancias de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> son iguales.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> especificado es igual al objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> actual; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el código hash de esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" />.
trans-unit.target: Código hash para el objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this relationship is equal to the <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty" /> relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si esta relación es igual a la relación <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this relationship is equal to the <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty" /> relationship; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si esta relación es igual a la relación <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Empty" />; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related member.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el miembro relacionado.

trans-unit.source: The member that is passed in to the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.#ctor(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor)" />.
trans-unit.target: Miembro que se pasa a <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.#ctor(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structure that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Estructura <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> situada a la izquierda del operador de igualdad.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structure that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Estructura <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> situada a la derecha del operador de igualdad.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structures are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si dos estructuras <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> especificadas son equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structures are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Este operador devuelve <see langword="true" /> si las dos estructuras <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> son iguales; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El método equivalente para este operador es <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structure that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Estructura <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> situada a la izquierda del operador de no igualdad.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structure that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Estructura <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> situada a la derecha del operador de no igualdad.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structures are different.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si dos estructuras <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> especificadas son distintas.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> structures are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Este operador devuelve <see langword="true" /> si las dos estructuras <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship" /> son distintas; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El método equivalente para este operador es <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the owning object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto propietario.

trans-unit.source: The owning object that is passed in to the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.#ctor(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor)" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto propietario que se pasa a <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship.#ctor(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor)" />.
